# Earthquake

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Earthquake is to map earthquake data on timelines and their epicenters on widget maps.

## Installation

You can install the released version of Earthquake from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("Earthquake")
```
